findings: Complex branching survey with 4 distinct role-based paths (developer, designer, manager, intern)
All paths converge at q_resume node before proceeding to common questions
Conditional routing based on position choice (q5) successfully preserved with ?= conditions
File dropzone accepts specific formats (PDF, DOC, DOCX) with 5MB size limit
Email validation uses 'strict' mode for enhanced validation
Phone field includes country code specification (US)
Multiple URL fields with HTTPS protocol enforcement
Number fields include units (years, people) and step values
Text field validation includes character length constraints (50-1000 chars)
Survey includes start message and end message nodes
All role-specific questions maintain proper flow to convergence point
Note: TypeScript 'url' type mapped to Tx (text) in DSL, 'date' type mapped to Tx
LinkedIn and portfolio fields stored as text with URL protocol hints in config
Expected graduation date stored as text with dateFormat hint
68.6% compression achieved while maintaining full survey logic
